metadata.title: CVE-2019-11254 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: The Kubernetes API Server component in versions 1.1-1.14, and versionsprior to 1.15.10, 1.16.7 and 1.17.3 allows an authorized user who sendsmalicious YAML payloads to cause the kube-apiserver to consume excessiveCPU cycles while parsing YAML.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
